column2: it is a revalution of tasete
column3: you must make reservation otherwise it is usually at least 40min wait. It is very expensive
column4: and the portion is very small. my friend recommanded to let the waiter order for us
column5: we gave him $50 per person bugget
column6: and he did a great job with it. There is one dish i cant forget it is made with sizzing rice in a hot pot with some seafood
column8: that is one dish you must order!
